title: How to Make Potato 65

steps.headline: Cook potatoes in pressure cooker until one whistle sound or when it's half boiled.
Peel outer skin and dice into big cubes if you cooked the potatoes while.
Sprinkle a little salt, baking powder and gram flour on to the potatoes.
Deep fry in hot oil until light brown.
Tie curds in a clean muslin cloth and hang it until water drains from it.
Remove the curd cheese from the cloth and whip it with a spoon until it becomes soft.
Cut onions into 1" long pieces.
steps.description: Slit green chillies into two lengthwise.

steps.headline: Heat 2 tbsp of oil and fry chillies and onions along with Ajinomoto.
Add the whipped curds when the mixture turns golden brown.
Sprinkle in salt, chilli powder and garam masala powder.
Fry on a medium flame/heat stirring constantly until oil is separated.
Add fried potatoes with a little water if necessary.
Boil for few minutes and serve hot.

text: Cook potatoes in pressure cooker until one whistle sound or when it's half boiled. Alternatively, par-boil peeled, chopped potatoes. Peel outer skin and dice into big cubes if you cooked the potatoes while.  Sprinkle a little salt, baking powder and gram flour on to the potatoes.  Deep fry in hot oil until light brown. Put aside. Tie curds in a clean muslin cloth and hang it until water drains from it.  Remove the curd cheese from the cloth and whip it with a spoon until it becomes soft.  Cut onions into 1" long pieces. Slit green chillies into two lengthwise. Heat 2 tbsp of oil and fry chillies and onions along with Ajinomoto.  Add the whipped curds when the mixture turns golden brown.  Sprinkle in salt, chilli powder and garam masala powder.  Fry on a medium flame/heat stirring constantly until oil is separated.  Add fried potatoes with a little water if necessary.  Boil for few minutes and serve hot.
